concept.title: Create a meeting
concept.shortdesc: You can create a moderated/personal meeting from the Create a new meeting screen.

conbody.p:
To create a meeting:
Tap Meeting name to give a name to your personal meeting room.When you type the Meeting name, it activates Start Meeting or Save and copy.
Tap Meeting Password to add a password. The minimum length of the password must be 8 characters.
Tap Moderated Meeting to control the aspects of the meeting. This option allows only you or a designated moderator to start and control the other aspects of the meeting.
Tap Allow guest access for users to enter the meeting in view-only mode.
Tap Save to return to the My Meetings list where your meeting will be saved at the top of the list.
